legal.privacyIntroBody: Solvr Labs ("we", "our", or "us") operates the TaskLine mobile application. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application. By using TaskLine, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
legal.dataWeCollectBody:
We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

- Account information: name, email address, and password
- Business profile: business name, phone number, business type, tax ID, website URL, and business address
- Client data: client names, email addresses, phone numbers, company names, and notes
- Project and task data: project details, task descriptions, deadlines, and status updates
- Financial data: invoice amounts, payment terms, and billing information
- Property data: addresses, access codes, and property details
- Booking data: appointment dates, times, and service details
- Communications: messages exchanged through the request messaging system
legal.howWeUseDataBody:
We use the information we collect to:

- Provide, maintain, and improve our services
- Process transactions and send related information
- Send notifications about your account and service updates
- Respond to your comments, questions, and support requests
- Monitor and analyze usage trends to improve user experience
- Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
legal.dataStorageBody: Your data is stored securely using Supabase, a cloud database service with enterprise-grade security. Data is encrypted in transit using TLS/SSL. Authentication tokens are stored locally on your device using encrypted secure storage (Expo SecureStore on iOS and Android).
legal.thirdPartyServicesBody:
We use the following third-party services to operate TaskLine:

- Supabase: Database hosting, authentication, and real-time data synchronization
- Stripe: Payment processing for subscription billing (we do not store your credit card information)
- Expo: Application build and update infrastructure

These services have their own privacy policies governing data they process on our behalf.
legal.dataSecurityBody:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:

- Encryption of data in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
- Secure token storage on your device
- Row-level security policies on our database
- Input sanitization and secure logging practices
- Regular security assessments
legal.yourRightsBody:
You have the right to:

- Access your personal data at any time through the app
- Update or correct your personal information via Settings
- Delete your account and all associated data from within the app (Settings > Danger Zone > Delete Account)
- Export your data by contacting support@solvrlabs.com
- Opt out of non-essential communications

For GDPR and CCPA purposes, we act as the data controller for your information.
legal.dataRetentionBody: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. When you delete your account, we permanently remove all your data from our systems within 30 days. We may retain certain anonymized, aggregated data for analytics purposes.
legal.childrensPrivacyBody: TaskLine is not intended for use by children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If we become aware that we have collected data from a child under 16, we will take steps to delete that information.
legal.policyChangesBody: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the app and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
legal.contactUsBody:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Solvr Labs
Email: support@solvrlabs.com
Website: https://taskline.solvrlabs.com
legal.tosAcceptanceBody: By accessing or using TaskLine, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use the application. These terms apply to all users of the application.
legal.tosDescriptionBody: TaskLine is a client management platform designed for freelancers and tradespeople. The service allows you to manage clients, projects, tasks, invoices, bookings, properties, and communications. TaskLine is provided "as is" and we reserve the right to modify or discontinue features at any time.
legal.tosAccountsBody: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
legal.tosAcceptableUseBody:
You agree not to:

- Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
- Transmit any harmful, threatening, or abusive content
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
- Use the service to send spam or unsolicited communications
- Interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of the service
- Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the source code of the application
legal.tosPaymentsBody: TaskLine offers free and paid subscription tiers. Paid subscriptions are billed monthly or annually through our payment processor, Stripe. You may cancel your subscription at any time. Refunds are handled in accordance with the applicable app store policies and our refund policy. Feature access is determined by your active subscription tier.
legal.tosIntellectualPropertyBody: TaskLine and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Solvr Labs and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of the data you input into TaskLine.
legal.tosTerminationBody: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings. Data associated with terminated accounts will be deleted in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
legal.tosLiabilityBody: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Solvr Labs shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use or inability to use the service. Our total liability for any claims related to the service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim.
legal.tosGoverningLawBody: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these terms or the use of TaskLine shall be resolved through binding arbitration.
legal.tosChangesBody: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes through the app or via email. Your continued use of TaskLine after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
